name: Blindling Hills
description:
Submission for BenBonk Game Jam

Don't Trust Eyes..

FOLLOW THE FIRE TO WATERFALL to complete the Game... NEVER LOOK BACK...

Controls:-

W/A/S/D - Movement

This was an experiment kind of horror game, where there is nothing on screen and player has to find a way to exit using only his hearing skills (i.e to become a daredevil).

This is a non-commercial personal project and no payments/money is intended to make out of it.

Sound Effects:- Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com 

Background Music:- Youtube Audio Library
